blogPost.excerpt: Our team at Snipfeed created LinkFree because we think it should be free for creators to aggregate their favorite links in a beautiful landing page.
blogPost.body: Our team at Snipfeed created LinkFree because we think it should be free for creators to aggregate their favorite links in a beautiful landing page.
blogPost.title: LinkFree - Your social website, for free.
blogPost.author: Rédouane Rmdn

localize.description: 我们Snipfeed的团队创建了LinkFree，因为我们认为创作者应该免费将他们最喜欢的链接汇总到一个漂亮的登陆页面中。
我們Snipfeed的團隊創建了LinkFree，因爲我們認爲創作者應該免費將他們最喜歡的鏈接彙總到一個漂亮的登陸頁面中。

previous.excerpt: Nwcode - is a no-code platform for building powerful web and mobile apps, that can include payments, notifications, and more. Integration with Woocommerce, Shopify in two clicks
previous.title: Nwicode - Build apps for every platform, without code ✨

localize.description: Nwcode - 是一个无代码平台，用于构建强大的网络和移动应用程序，可以包括支付，通知等。与Woocommerce、Shopify的整合只需两次点击。
localize.tagline: 为每个平台构建应用程序，无需代码✨。

localize.description: Nwcode - 是一個無代碼平臺，用於構建強大的網絡和移動應用程序，可以包括支付，通知等。與Woocommerce、Shopify的整合只需兩次點擊。
localize.tagline: 爲每個平臺構建應用程序，無需代碼✨。

localize.description: Leaf-Let是一個自由格式的板子，用於可視化記事。具有真正的隱私性。
localize.tagline: 自由格式的板塊，用於可視化記事。
